addon.description: Colour square aspect (64x64) video classification icons for use with MPAA ListItem in Kodi. Can be used by Kodi skins using skin variables to show icons or the much quicker $INFO as a texture method. Details of usage and supported icons in the README.md file.
addon.license: Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 United States
addon.name: Classification Icons - Colour
addon.news: 0.0.3[CR]  - Add additional naming of Spanish files to allow for Embuary helper returning additional characters in locale name .[CR]  - Update readme file to show current state of play.
